alert.note: Alert for Golden Valley; Judith Gap; Southern Wheatland (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 01 at 5:15PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Wheatland and central Golden Valley Counties through 545 PM MDT... At 513 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles north of Deadmans Basin Reservoir, or 17 miles east of Harlowton, moving north at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. Light accumulations of small hail is possible. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Deadmans Basin Reservoir and Shawmut. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Heavy rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
